name: dismembered
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
dismember
to cut, tear, or pull the arms and legs off the body of a dead person or animal: The police found the dismembered body of a young man in the murderer's freezer.
literary to divide a country or an empire into different parts: The UN protested at the dismembering of Bosnia.
